metadata.title: CVE-2018-12606 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community Edition and Enterprise Editionbefore 10.7.6, 10.8.x before 10.8.5, and 11.x before 11.0.1. The wikicontains a persistent XSS issue due to a lack of output encoding affectinga specific markdown feature.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
